question_text: Which of the following best explains the function of a browser request in relation to a web server?
answer_options: It sends an email to the server to fetch user credentials
It initiates a DNS lookup for all IP addresses on the network
It requests specific content or resources using protocols like HTTP or HTTPS
It manages database tables for website content
correct_answer: It requests specific content or resources using protocols like HTTP or HTTPS
explanation: A browser sends requests to a web server to retrieve web content (like HTML files) using HTTP or HTTPS protocols.
